external_games.name: The Frosty Leaves 寒叶下的薄冰

name: The Frosty Leaves
storyline: This is a tragedy cause by illegal plant collecting. The main character, Leng Xiaobing, was a normal shop keeper form a grocery store, but things changed after she met a strange man...
summary: This is a mystery horror adventure game with seven chapters. In every chapter, the first part will be solving mysteries and the second part will be like a vision novel. Depending on the choices and the items you collected through out the game, there are going to be two different endings waiting for you to discover.
